English: When the duration ends, if there is any remaining shield, increase all allies' Attack by the proportion of the remaining shield (current remaining amount increases by &a%), and reduce the cost of the next skill used by all allies by 1.
Chinese: 持续时间结束时若仍有剩余保护罩，根据剩余保护罩的比例提升所有友军攻击力(当前剩余量提升&a%)，并使所有友军下一个使用的技能费用减少1点。

English: Reduces the cost of the next skill used by self by 1.
Chinese: 自身下一个使用的技能费用减少1点。

English:
&b/&c
&user and reinforcements summoned by &user will apply [Stun] (<sprite=2>&a1%) to the last attacked target after every &c attacks (Follow-up attacks count as 0.5).
If [Stun] applied by this effect is resisted, increase damage received by the target by 12% for 3 turns (<sprite=0>&a2%).
Chinese:
&b/&c
&user及&user召唤入场的增援单位每进行&c次攻击(追加攻击视为0.5次)，对最后攻击的目标施加【眩晕】(<sprite=2>&a1%)。
此效果施加的【眩晕】被抵抗时，使目标3回合内受到的伤害增加12%(<sprite=0>&a2%)

English: Inserts 1 [Steady Shot] with a 3-turn countdown each round.
Chinese: 每回合置入1个倒计时3的【沉稳射击】。

English: Inserts 1 [Steady Shot] with a 3-turn countdown each round.
Chinese: 每回合置入1个倒计时3的【沉稳射击】。

English: Inserts 1 [Exploitative Strike] with a 5-turn countdown each round.
Chinese: 每回合置入1个倒计时5的【剥削打击】。

English: Reduces 1 stack when receiving a Critical hit.
Inserts 1 [Blade Dance] with a 2-turn countdown each round and increases Standby count by 2.
Chinese: 每回合置入1个倒计时2的【锋舞】，等待次数+2。

English:
When this unit's attack deals damage, performs a Follow-up attack equal to 50% of the damage dealt.
(This effect cannot trigger itself again)
Chinese:
自身的攻击造成伤害时，以50%的伤害量进行1次追击。
(不会再次触发上述效果)

English: Inserts 1 [Misfortune Assault] with a 2-turn countdown each round.
Chinese: 每回合置入1个倒计时2的【厄运侵袭】。

English: Reduces non-Pain damage received by &arm points.
Chinese: 受到的非痛苦伤害减少&arm点。

English:
&a takes attacks in their place. 
Gains Defense equal to &a's Defense.
Chinese:
由&a代替承受攻击。
获得等同于&a防御力的防御力。

English:
Reduces non-Pain damage received by &arm points. 
Counters enemy attacks with &anti damage.
Chinese:
受到的非痛苦伤害减少&arm点。
受到敌人攻击时，以&anti点伤害进行反击。

English: After being hit by an attack, increases Dodge rate by 30%. Resets Dodge rate bonus from this effect upon dodging.
Chinese: 被攻击命中后闪避率增加30%，闪避攻击时重置上述效果获得的闪避率。

English: When hit by an attack, reduces duration by 1 turn and decreases damage received based on Dodge rate (&a%).
Chinese: 被攻击命中时，减少1回合持续时间，并使受到的伤害根据闪避率减少(&a%)。

English:
Gains 1% Dodge rate for every 2% HP lost. 
Gains 1% Critical rate for every 2% HP retained. 
Restores HP to 15% of max HP when falling below 15% for the first time. &used1
Chinese:
每失去2%的体力值，闪避率增加1%。
每保有2%的体力值，暴击率增加1%。
首次体力值低于15%的最大体力值时，将体力值恢复至15%。&used1

English:
Add 1 [Assault Order] with a 2-turn countdown each round. 
Add 1 additional [Assault Order] with a 3-turn countdown during the first 2 turns after entering battle.
(Current turn count: &num1)
Chinese:
每回合置入1个倒计时2【突击指令】。
入场后的前2回合额外置入1个倒计时3的【突击指令】。
(当前回合数：&num1)

English:
Cannot be healed. Dies immediately if HP drops below 1. 
At the start of the 3rd turn after entering battle, deals 1000% of remaining HP as damage to all enemies and dies if still alive.
(Current turn count: &num1)
Chinese:
无法受到治疗，体力值低于1时立刻死亡。
入场后的第3回合开始时若仍存活，对所有敌人造成剩余体力值1000%的伤害并死亡。
(当前回合数：&num1)

English: When dealing damage with a non-Follow-up attack, deals 33% of the damage as a Follow-up attack to all enemies.
Chinese: 非追加攻击造成伤害时，以伤害量的33%对所有敌人进行追击。

English:
Reduces non-Pain damage received by &arm points. 
Add 1 [Fierce Assault] with a 4-turn countdown each round.
Chinese:
受到的非痛苦伤害减少&arm点。
每回合置入1个倒计时4【猛烈强袭】。

English:
Dies immediately when clicking this icon or when &master dies. 
Increases Overload of &allSummoner by 1 at the start of each turn. 
Cannot overheal beyond HP limit.
Chinese:
点击此图标或&master死亡时立即死亡。
回合开始时使&allSummoner过载增加1点。
无法超出体力极限获得治疗。
代理人召唤物被动通用buff

English:
Only selectable when HP is above 0 and &allSummoner's Overload is below 3. 
Suffers &consumHP Pain damage and increases &allSummoner's Overload by 1.
Chinese:
仅在生命值大于0且自身&allSummoner过载小于3时可选。
受到&consumHP点痛苦伤害并使自身&allSummoner过载额外+1。

English: Answering your call, I have returned to your side once more.
Chinese: 响应您的呼唤，我再次来到您身边了。

English:
Some skills can summon Sangvis Ferri reinforcements. 
Reduces Overload of all allies by 1 when any other ally dies.

At Lv.3, gains [Targeted Analysis Contract] to replace 1 exclusive skill.
At Lv.5, gains a 2nd [Targeted Analysis Contract] and equipment [Maid Protocol].
Chinese:
部分技能可以召唤铁血工造增援单位入场。
任意其他友军死亡时，所有友军过载减少1点。

3级时获得道具【定向解析契约】，使用后可替换1个专属技能。
5级时获得第2张【定向解析契约】与装备【女仆守则】。

English:
Agent is a Sangvis Ferri Rear Command Doll in charge of liaising between Elisa and her Sangvis subordinates as well as logistics management. As a high-ranking unit adept at both combat and tactics, she's able to command all Dolls in combat, and they all directly answer to her. Calm and composed, she always speaks in a courteous tone to friends and foes alike. However, apart from the genuine respect she has for her master, she holds everyone else in low regard.

Can summon reinforcements to protect allies and sustain damage output through tactical deployment.
Chinese:
代理人是铁血工造后卫指挥人形，负责伊莱莎与下属铁血的沟通联络工作和后勤管理，作战人形都直接听从她的命令，地位极高，无论战斗还是指挥都很擅长，可以指挥所有作战人形。冷淡平静，有条不紊的言行做派，对敌我都会用尊敬的语气，但实际上除了对主人十分尊重之外，称呼他人的词汇都很低劣。

能够召唤增援单位协同作战，通过调用不同的增援单位，可以兼顾保护友军与对敌持续输出。

English: T_agt_3_1: My apologies... This is a failure of my duties as a maid...
Chinese: T_agt_3_1:抱歉，这是我作为女仆的失格···

English: T_agt_6_1: Industrial scrap. Please refrain from flailing about so conspicuously.
Chinese: T_agt_6_1:工业废渣，请不要公然晃来晃去。

English: T_agt_7_1: Thank you for providing these resources. I assure you they'll be utilized with maximum efficiency.
Chinese: T_agt_7_1:感谢您愿意付出这份资源，我保证它们会发挥出最大的价值。

English: T_agt_1_1: Any orders? Or perhaps... requiring service?
Chinese: T_agt_1_1:有命令吗？还是，需要什么服务吗？

English: T_agt_1_2: Agent standing by. Summon me anytime if service is required.
Chinese: T_agt_1_2:代理人待命中，需要服务请随时召唤。

English: T_agt_5_1: I have delivered your demise.
T_agt_2_1: Have I become incapable of defeating even such pathetic vermin...
Chinese: T_agt_2_1:连这样的可怜虫，我都无法获胜了吗···

English: T_agt_4_1: Trash obstructing my master? Allow me to dispose of it.
Chinese: T_agt_4_1:妨碍到主人的垃圾吗，请由我来为您清扫吧。

English: T_agt_9_1: I shall utilize this appropriately. Please rest assured.
Chinese: T_agt_9_1:我会妥善利用的，请您放心。

English: T_agt_8_1: Which garbage shall we eliminate today?
Chinese: T_agt_8_1:今天要抹掉的垃圾，是哪些呢？

English: T_agt_11_1: A cleaning mission? Entrust it to me.
Chinese: T_agt_11_1:清扫任务吗，请交给我吧。

English: T_agt_11_2: This is... not a laughing matter...
Chinese: T_agt_11_2:真是个···笑不出来的笑话···

English: T_agt_11_3: I advise you to abandon your dignity as mere riffraff.
Chinese: T_agt_11_3:杂鱼的尊严，还望您就此抛弃吧。

English: Forget an exclusive skill, then select a new one from all exclusive skills.
Chinese: 遗忘一个专属技能，然后从所有专属技能中选择一个学习。
Chinese-TW [zh-tw]: 遺忘一個專屬技能，然後從所有專屬技能中選擇一個學習。

English:
When any other ally dies, resets Agent's Overload. 
<color=red>Agent only</color>
Chinese:
任意其他友军死亡时，重置代理人的过载。
<color=red>仅限代理人佩戴</color>

English:
Prioritizes drawing 4 different ally skills. 
Reduces this skill's cost by 1 for each Sangvis Ferri reinforcement on field.
Chinese:
优先抽取4个不同友军的技能。
场上每存在1个铁血工造增援单位，此技能费用减少1点。

无视防御。
优先攻击非嘲讽状态的敌人。

无视防御。
优先攻击非嘲讽状态的敌人。

English:
Ignores Defense. 
Guaranteed Critical when targeting non-Taunt enemies.
Chinese:
无视防御。
指向非嘲讽状态的敌人时，必定暴击。

English:
Summons [Jaeger].
[Jaeger] has:

&maxhp Max HP
&cri% Critical rate
&def% Defense
&dod% Dodge rate
Other stats match &user (excluding Buffs)

Add 1 [Steady Shot] with 3-turn countdown each round. 
Fixed skill: [Raptor Strike].
Chinese:
召唤单位【猎鸥】入场。
【猎鸥】具有：
&maxhp点最大生命值,
&cri%的暴击率，
&def%的防御力，
&dod%的闪避率。
剩余属性与&user保持一致(不计算Buff)。
每回合置入1个倒计时3的【沉稳射击】。
固定技能为【枭兽打击】。

English:
Choose:
Cover: Add 1 [Steady Shot] per round for 3 turns, prioritizing non-Taunt enemies.
Reinforce: Summons [Jaeger].
Chinese:
选择：
掩护：3回合内，每回合置入1个【沉稳射击】，优先攻击非嘲讽状态的敌人。
增援：召唤【猎鸥】入场。

English:
Deals additional damage equal to 1% of target's max HP.
(Max &a)
Chinese:
额外造成目标最大生命值1%的伤害。
(最多&a点)

English: Marks target as priority for [Exploitative Strike].
Chinese: 目标将作为【剥削打击】的优先攻击目标。

English:
Summons [Nemeum].
[Nemeum] has:

&maxhp Max HP
&def% Defense
&dod% Dodge rate
Other stats match &user (excluding Buffs)

Add 1 [Exploitative Strike] with 5-turn countdown each round. 
Fixed skill: [Designation Signal].
Chinese:
召唤单位【钢狮】入场。
【钢狮】具有：
&maxhp点最大生命值,
&def%的防御力，
&dod%的闪避率。
剩余属性与&user保持一致(不计算Buff)。
每回合置入1个倒计时5的【剥削打击】。
固定技能为【定点信号】

English:
Choose:
Cover: Applies 5 [Brutal Mark] stacks to single enemy.
Reinforce: Summons [Nemeum].
Chinese:
选择：
掩护：对单个敌人施加5层【暴虐印记】。
增援：召唤【钢狮】入场。
优先抽取1个目标的技能。

English:
Summons [Dragoon].
[Dragoon] has:

&maxhp Max HP
&cri% Critical rate
&def% Defense
&dod% Dodge rate
Other stats match &user (excluding Buffs)

Add 1 [Blade Dance] with 2-turn countdown each round. 
Fixed skill: [Mobile Support].
Chinese:
召唤单位【龙骑兵】入场。
【龙骑兵】具有：
&maxhp点最大生命值,
&cri%的暴击率，
&def%的防御力，
&dod%的闪避率。
剩余属性与&user保持一致(不计算Buff)。
每回合置入1个倒计时2的【锋舞】。
固定技能为【机动援护】

English:
Choose:
Cover: Applies shield to all allies.
Reinforce: Summons [Dragoon].
Chinese:
选择：
掩护：对所有友军施加保护罩。
增援：召唤【龙骑兵】入场。

English: Selects and uses 1 skill from allies' current/previous turn skills.
Chinese: 从本回合与上回合友军释放过的技能中选择1个释放。

English:
Summons [Puppet Clone].
[Puppet Clone] has:

&maxhp Max HP
&def% Defense
&dod% Dodge rate
Other stats match &user (excluding Buffs)

Add 1 [Misfortune Assault] with 2-turn countdown each round. 
Fixed skill: [Linked Projection].
Chinese:
召唤单位【傀儡分身】入场。
【傀儡分身】具有：
&maxhp点最大生命值,
&def%的防御力，
&dod%的闪避率。
剩余属性与&user保持一致(不计算Buff)。
每回合置入1个倒计时2的【厄运侵袭】。
固定技能为【连携映射】。

English:
Choose:
Cover: Applies [Puppet Projection] to single ally.
Reinforce: Summons [Puppet Clone].
Chinese:
选择：
掩护：对单个友军施加【傀儡映射】。
增援：召唤【傀儡分身】入场。

English:
Summons [Aegis].
[Aegis] has:

&maxhp Max HP
&def% Defense
&dod% Dodge rate
Other stats match &user (excluding Buffs)

Fixed skill: [Unyielding Defense].
Chinese:
召唤单位【圣盾】入场。
【圣盾】具有：
&maxhp点最大生命值,
&def%的防御力，
&dod%的闪避率。
剩余属性与&user保持一致(不计算Buff)。
固定技能为【无畏防御】。

English:
Choose:
Cover: Applies [Protective Coating] to single ally.
Reinforce: Summons [Aegis].
Chinese:
选择：
掩护：对单个友军施加【防护涂层】。
增援：召唤【圣盾】入场。

English:
Summons [Ripper].
[Ripper] has:

&maxhp Max HP
&def% Defense
&dod% Dodge rate
Other stats match &user (excluding Buffs)

Add 1 [Blind Fire] with 2-turn countdown each round. 
Fixed skill: [Crisis Perception].
Chinese:
召唤单位【切割者】入场。
【切割者】具有：
&maxhp点最大生命值,
&def%的防御力，
&dod%的闪避率。
剩余属性与&user保持一致(不计算Buff)。
每回合置入1个倒计时2的【盲射】。
固定技能为【危机感应】。

English:
Choose:
Cover: Applies [Extreme Adaptation] to single ally.
Reinforce: Summons [Ripper].
Chinese:
选择：
掩护：对单个友军施加【极限适性】。
增援：召唤【切割者】入场。

English: Attacks target enemy equal to number of skills used on enemies this turn (&anum).
Chinese: 根据本回合对敌人使用技能的次数(&anum)，重复攻击目标敌人。

English:
Attack 4 times. 
Prioritizes last enemy targeted by ally skills.
Chinese:
攻击4次。
优先攻击最后被友军技能指向的敌人。

English:
Summons [Striker].
[Striker] has:

&maxhp Max HP
&def% Defense
&dod% Dodge rate
Other stats match &user (excluding Buffs)

Add 1 [Assault Order] with 2-turn countdown each round.
Chinese:
召唤单位【痛击者】入场。
【痛击者】具有：
&maxhp点最大生命值,
&def%的防御力，
&dod%的闪避率。
剩余属性与&user保持一致(不计算Buff)。
每回合置入1个倒计时2的【突击指令】。

English:
Choose:
Cover: Repeats attack on target equal to number of skills used on enemies this turn (&anum).
Reinforce: Summons [Striker].
Chinese:
选择：
掩护：根据本回合对敌人使用技能的次数(&anum)，重复攻击目标敌人。
增援：召唤【痛击者】入场。

English:
Summons [Goliath].
[Goliath] has:

&maxhp Max HP
&def% Defense
&dod% Dodge rate
Other stats match &user (excluding Buffs)
Chinese:
召唤单位【歌利亚】入场。
【歌利亚】具有：
&maxhp点最大生命值,
&def%的防御力，
&dod%的闪避率。
剩余属性与&user保持一致(不计算Buff)。

English:
Choose:
Cover: Deals &a damage to all enemies.
Reinforce: Summons [Goliath].
Chinese:
选择：
掩护：对所有敌人造成&a点伤害
增援：召唤【歌利亚】入场。

English:
Applies [Stun] (<sprite=2>&a%) when targeting enemy with highest HP. 
Guaranteed Critical when targeting enemy with lowest HP. 
On kill, performs Follow-up attack on lowest HP enemy based on overkill damage.
Chinese:
以体力值最高的敌人为目标时，附带【眩晕】(<sprite=2>&a%)。
以体力值最低的敌人为目标时必定暴击。
击杀目标时，根据溢出伤害量对体力值最低的敌方单位进行1次追击。

English:
Summons [Manticore].
[Manticore] has:

&maxhp Max HP
&def% Defense
&dod% Dodge rate
Other stats match &user (excluding Buffs)

Add 1 [Fierce Assault] with 4-turn countdown each round. 
Fixed skill: [Adaptive Suppression].
Chinese:
召唤单位【蝎甲兽】入场。
【蝎甲兽】具有：
&maxhp点最大生命值,
&def%的防御力，
&dod%的闪避率。
剩余属性与&user保持一致(不计算Buff)。
每回合置入1个倒计时4的【猛烈强袭】。
固定技能为【应变式压制】。

English:
Choose:
Cover: Applies [Resonance] to target ally.
Reinforce: Summons [Manticore].
Chinese:
选择：
掩护：对目标友军施加【轰鸣】。
增援：召唤【蝎甲兽】入场。

English: When used, all Sangvis Ferri reinforcements perform 1 additional attack per round.
Chinese: 使用时，使所有铁血工造增援单位额外进行1次每回合的攻击。

English: When targeting Sangvis Ferri reinforcements with healing skills, allows overhealing beyond HP limit and applies Overheal.
Chinese: 指向铁血工造增援单位时，使其可以超出体力极限获得治疗，并对其造成超额治疗。
